sentences.english: Would like to see a few FB pages you have done.
sentences.chinese: 想看到你做了几个库务局网页。

sentences.english: I have a homework about HTML need you for help. My group member can not do it!
sentences.chinese: 我有一个网页制作的作业需要你帮忙。

sentences.english: This is the webpage of Journal of Cutaneous Medicine and Surgery.
sentences.chinese: 这是《皮肤医学和外科学杂志》的网页。

sentences.english: He also created a functioning replica of MySpace's log-in page.
sentences.chinese: 斯克姆还创建了MySpace的登陆网页的复制品。

sentences.english: This is the web page of Bio-medical Materials and Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 这是生物医学材料与工程的网页。

sentences.english: We think we don’t need to explain how paper and card textures are being used in web designing and give the design a very rough cut-and-paste and unpolished style.
sentences.chinese: 如何在网页中模仿纸张的质感无需我们赘述了。

sentences.english: This is the web page of Invertebrate Systematics.
sentences.chinese: 这是无脊椎动物系统分类学的网页。

sentences.english: The larger the font size is, the easier it is for readers to actually read the text presented on a given web-page.
sentences.chinese: 字体越大，读者越容易看到呈现在网页上的内容。

sentences.english: The performance is optimized by using a pyrotechnic igniter as described in the Igniter web page.
sentences.chinese: 性能优化，使用烟火点火器中所述的引爆器的网页。

sentences.english: We will also need an attractive webdesign.
sentences.chinese: 我们还需要一个有吸引力的网页设计。

sentences.english: What makes design easier is developing a good work-flow, a good system for design.
sentences.chinese: 来自上海的网页前端开发工程师和网页设计师。

sentences.english: What makes design easier is developing a good work-flow, a good system for design.
sentences.chinese: 来自上海的网页前端开发工程师和网页设计师。

sentences.english: Just about every aspect of a website can be split-tested.
sentences.chinese: 几乎网页的所有方方面面都可以进行对比测试。

sentences.english: Creative sketchbook allows you to draw websites and web apps.
sentences.chinese: 很有创意的速写册，可供你画出网址和网页应用软件。

sentences.english: Use this page to edit a column of this discussion board.
sentences.chinese: 使用此网页可编辑此讨论板的栏。

sentences.english: Use colours found in key photos or graphics on your web page for added harmony.
sentences.chinese: 用颜色或图形找到关键照片你网页续和谐。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
home page (of a website)/title page/front page/first page/fig. beginning/cover letter
